rules_text:
[i]Rising Flame[/i] – Tiki, Dragon Scion gets +1/+1 for each card in your hand.
[i]Divine Blessing[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, you draw a card, then you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
Partner with Robin, High Deliverer [i](When this creature enters, target player may put Robin into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]
